planet.name: OGLE-2018-BLG-1011L b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Han et al. 2019. This was a ground based discovery. The parameters listed here are those reported by Han et al. 2019 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
